name: data-card-04
effect: Records the number of times the trainer’s Pokémon have jumped in the Pokéathlon.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer’s Pokémon have jumped in the Pokéathlon.

flavor_text.black_white: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have jumped.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It holds Pokéathlon records. It’s a card that shows how many times your Pokémon have jumped.
